 40class FaissAdapter:
 41    """Faissadapter."""
 42
 43    def __init__(self, db_path: str, factory: str = "OPQ64,IVF8192,PQ64", metric: str = "ip"):
 44        """Init.
 45
 46        Args:
 47            db_path (str): TODO.
 48            factory (str): TODO.
 49            metric (str): TODO.
 50        """


[docs]
 51        self.db_path = db_path




[docs]
 52        self.factory = factory




[docs]
 53        self.metric = metric




[docs]
 54        self.index: Any | None = None




[docs]
 55        self.idmap: list[str] | None = None




[docs]
 56        self.vecs: DenseVecs | None = None


 57
 58    def _load_dense_parquet(self) -> DenseVecs:
 59        """Load dense parquet.
 60
 61        Returns:
 62            DenseVecs: TODO.
 63        """
 64        if not Path(self.db_path).exists():
 65            raise RuntimeError("DuckDB registry not found")
 66        con = duckdb.connect(self.db_path)
 67        try:
 68            dr = con.execute(
 69                "SELECT parquet_root, dim FROM dense_runs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1"
 70            ).fetchone()
 71            if not dr:
 72                raise RuntimeError("No dense_runs found")
 73            root = dr[0]
 74            rows = con.execute(
 75                f"""
 76              SELECT chunk_id, vector FROM read_parquet('{root}/*/*.parquet', union_by_name=true)
 77            """
 78            ).fetchall()
 79        finally:
 80            con.close()
 81        ids = [r[0] for r in rows]
 82        mat = np.stack([np.array(r[1], dtype=np.float32) for r in rows])
 83        # normalize for cosine/IP
 84        norms = np.linalg.norm(mat, axis=1, keepdims=True) + 1e-9
 85        mat = mat / norms
 86        return DenseVecs(ids=ids, mat=mat)
 87


[docs]
 88    def build(self) -> None:
 89        """Build.
 90
 91        Returns:
 92            None: TODO.
 93        """
 94        vecs = self._load_dense_parquet()
 95        self.vecs = vecs
 96        if not HAVE_FAISS:
 97            return
 98        d = vecs.mat.shape[1]
 99        metric = faiss.METRIC_INNER_PRODUCT if self.metric == "ip" else faiss.METRIC_L2
100        cpu = faiss.index_factory(d, self.factory, metric)
101        cpu = faiss.IndexIDMap2(cpu)
102        train = vecs.mat[: min(100000, vecs.mat.shape[0])].copy()
103        faiss.normalize_L2(train)
104        cpu.train(train)
105        ids64 = np.arange(vecs.mat.shape[0], dtype=np.int64)
106        cpu.add_with_ids(vecs.mat, ids64)
107        res = faiss.StandardGpuResources()
108        co = faiss.GpuClonerOptions()
109        co.use_cuvs = True
110        try:
111            self.index = faiss.index_cpu_to_gpu(res, 0, cpu, co)
112        except Exception:
113            co.use_cuvs = False
114            self.index = faiss.index_cpu_to_gpu(res, 0, cpu, co)
115        self.idmap = vecs.ids


116


[docs]
117    def load_or_build(self, cpu_index_path: str | None = None) -> None:
118        """Load or build.
119
120        Args:
121            cpu_index_path (Optional[str]): TODO.
122
123        Returns:
124            None: TODO.
125        """
126        try:
127            if HAVE_FAISS and cpu_index_path and Path(cpu_index_path).exists():
128                cpu = faiss.read_index(cpu_index_path)
129                res = faiss.StandardGpuResources()
130                co = faiss.GpuClonerOptions()
131                co.use_cuvs = True
132                try:
133                    self.index = faiss.index_cpu_to_gpu(res, 0, cpu, co)
134                except Exception:
135                    co.use_cuvs = False
136                    self.index = faiss.index_cpu_to_gpu(res, 0, cpu, co)
137                dv = self._load_dense_parquet()
138                self.vecs = dv
139                self.idmap = dv.ids
140                return
141        except Exception:
142            pass
143        self.build()


144


[docs]
145    def search(self, qvec: np.ndarray, k: int = 10) -> list[tuple[str, float]]:
146        """Search.
147
148        Args:
149            qvec (np.ndarray): TODO.
150            k (int): TODO.
151
152        Returns:
153            List[Tuple[str, float]]: TODO.
154        """
155        if self.vecs is None and self.index is None:
156            return []
157        if HAVE_FAISS and self.index is not None:
158            if self.idmap is None:
159                raise RuntimeError("ID mapping not loaded for FAISS index")
160            q = qvec[None, :].astype(np.float32, copy=False)
161            distances, indices = self.index.search(q, k)
162            out = []
163            for idx, score in zip(indices[0], distances[0], strict=False):
164                if idx < 0:
165                    continue
166                out.append((self.idmap[int(idx)], float(score)))
167            return out
168        # numpy brute force
169        if self.vecs is None:
170            raise RuntimeError("Dense vectors not loaded")
171        mat = self.vecs.mat
172        q = qvec.astype(np.float32, copy=False)
173        q /= np.linalg.norm(q) + 1e-9
174        sims = mat @ q
175        topk = np.argsort(-sims)[:k]
176        ids = self.vecs.ids
177        return [(ids[i], float(sims[i])) for i in topk]
